headline: Exclusive-China conditionally approves DeepSeek to buy Nvidia's H200 chips  - sources
summary: China has given its top AI startup DeepSeek approval to buy Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips with regulatory conditions that ​are still being finalised, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.  Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang told reporters in Taipei on Thursday that his company had not received such information.  Nvidia did not respond to a request for comment on DeepSeek's approval.

content.title: Exclusive-China conditionally approves DeepSeek to buy Nvidia's H200 chips  - sources
content.summary: China has given its top AI startup DeepSeek approval to buy Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips with regulatory conditions that ​are still being finalised, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.  Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang told reporters in Taipei on Thursday that his company had not received such information.  Nvidia did not respond to a request for comment on DeepSeek's approval.

headline: Uber Weighs AV Labs Growth Against New Jersey Driver Ruling
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has launched AV Labs, a new division focused on using real world driving data to support autonomous vehicle and robotaxi development. The company announced fresh partnerships with Waabi to deploy thousands of self driving cars on its platform, and with Mercedes Benz and Nvidia to build a global robotaxi platform. A New Jersey jury has issued a verdict classifying Uber drivers as employees, a decision that could influence how gig workers are treated in that state...

content.title: Uber Weighs AV Labs Growth Against New Jersey Driver Ruling
content.summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has launched AV Labs, a new division focused on using real world driving data to support autonomous vehicle and robotaxi development. The company announced fresh partnerships with Waabi to deploy thousands of self driving cars on its platform, and with Mercedes Benz and Nvidia to build a global robotaxi platform. A New Jersey jury has issued a verdict classifying Uber drivers as employees, a decision that could influence how gig workers are treated in that state...

headline: Tencent’s Nvidia H200 Approval Reframes AI Growth And Investment Risks
summary: Tencent Holdings received regulatory approval to import Nvidia's H200 AI chips into China. The approval gives Tencent access to next generation AI hardware as part of a broader national push to accelerate artificial intelligence development. The move comes against a backdrop of technology restrictions and rising focus on AI among China's largest internet companies. Tencent Holdings (SEHK:700) now has the green light to bring in Nvidia's H200 chips, which sit at the high end of current AI...

headline: Nvidia Deepens AI Infrastructure Role With China, OpenAI And CoreWeave Deals
summary: China has approved imports of Nvidia's H200 AI chips for several major tech firms, opening a significant AI hardware channel into the country. Nvidia is in advanced talks to join a multi billion dollar OpenAI funding round alongside Amazon and Microsoft. The company has agreed to a new AI and high performance computing research collaboration with the U.S. Department of Energy, RIKEN, and Fujitsu. Nvidia has committed US$2b to deepen its AI data center partnership with CoreWeave. Nvidia...
